title: Crypto Bulls Lose $217M as Apparent Grayscale Sales Weighs on Bitcoin
description: Analysts also pointed out that GBTC shares flipped to a 0.9% discount on Thursday amid “likely selling pressure.”

title: South Korea’s Presidential Office urges local regulators to reconsider stance on Bitcoin ETFs
description: The presidential office's advisory to the FSC urged the regulatory body to revisit its stance on crypto offerings such as Bitcoin ETFs.

title: SEC Delays Decision On Fidelity’s Spot Ethereum ETF To March
description: According to a regulatory filing, the United States Securities and Exchange Commission has delayed its decision on Fidelity’s Spot Ethereum ETF proposal until the 5th of March.

title: Cathie Wood Challenges JPMorgan CEO’s Bitcoin Critique
description: Cathie Wood, CEO of ARK Invest, has strongly rebuked JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon’s dismissive remarks about Bitcoin, characterizing the cryptocurrency as a “pet rock.”  Wood’s response comes in the wake of Dimon’s comments made at the World Economic Forum, where he reiterated his earlier stance, labeling Bitcoin as “worthless” and a “hyped-up fraud.” Cathie […]

title: Arbitrum Unveils Orbit Expansion Program: Revolutionizing Custom Ethereum-Based Chains
description: Arbitrum, a frontrunner in Ethereum scaling solutions, has made waves in the blockchain community with the announcement of the Arbitrum Orbit expansion program. The innovative program is set to transform the landscape of Ethereum-based chains by offering a self-service path for the creation of custom Orbit chains, including both Layer 2 (L2) and Layer 3 […]

title: SatoshiVM’s Token Allocation: Laying the Foundations
description: SatoshiVM’s announcement of its token distribution model marks a significant milestone in the cryptocurrency sector, particularly for Bitcoin Layer2 projects. With a total supply cap of 21 million SAVM tokens, mirroring Bitcoin’s limit, the distribution model is meticulously designed to ensure a balanced and robust ecosystem. The largest portion, 36.5%, is allocated to ecosystem development, […]

title: Brad Garlinghouse Appreciates Bitcoin ETF Launch as a ‘Great Deal’
description:
In a recent interview, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse reiterated his optimistic views on the Bitcoin ETF launch, claiming that Bitcoin got institutional validation. Despite appreciating the Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) landmark decision in ETF, Garlingouse condemned the lack of regulatory clarity in the United States. Ripple’s CEO shared his disappointment with the regulatory policies […]
